name: Backline Raider

name: Pinch Runner
description: Gain additional Stamina Points while at low Health. This Effect has a Cooldown.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Gain %1 Stamina Point(s) when at %2 of Max Health or lower

name: Covert Operative

modifiers.HUDDesc: %1 Passive Dodge Chance Score after being Hit

name: The Wild Card
description: Attacks and Spells are more likely to be Critical Hits.

name: The Heat of Battle
description: Taking Damage gives you more Rage.

name: Second Wind

modifiers.HUDDesc: When under %2 of Maximum Health, trigger a burst of Health Regeneration

name: Attrition Strategist
description: Increases your Ailment Chance Score with all Ailments

name: Purifier's Will

modifiers.HUDDesc: The Critical Chance of a Dash Attack is doubled

name: Merciless Lethality
description: Your Critical Damage is increased, but your Damage is decreased.

name: Come What May
description: Projectiles that Hit an Enemy at close range Pierce them, meaning that the Projectile can Hit other Enemies behind them.

modifiers.HUDDesc: All Projectiles pierce every Target within a %1m radius

name: Persistence Hunting

description: Deal increased Damage when Far-Away from Enemies.

name: Feast for the Crows
description: Give all forms of damage Life Leech. Life Leech heals you on the next tick of Health Regeneration.

name: Blessed Manna
description: Health Globes will now provide a temporary Buff to your Resistances as well as Healing you.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %1 All Resistances Score for you and your Allies after a Health Globe is picked up

description: When inflicting Ailments, the number of Stacks inflicted on an Enemy is increased. The Damage you deal from sources other than those that deal damage-over-time is decreased.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %1 decrease to Damage that does not deal Damage-over-Time

name: Primordial Insights
description: Ailment Stacks inflicted with Critical Hits can deal Critical Damage.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Damage-Over-Time triggered with a Critical Hit deals Critical Damage

description: Hits can usually only apply one ailment type. Now 2 different ailments can be applied with the same hit.

name: Immortal Offering
description: Killing an enemy that is afflicted with Ailments gives you a temporary Damage increase Buff.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Killing an Enemy grants %1 Damage as corresponding Damage Type for each Ailment Stack on that Enemy (up to %2 Stacks per Damage Type)

name: Residual Energy
description: Casting a Spell increases the Damage of your Attacks for a short period of time. The Damage Type of those Attacks is the same as the last Spell Cast.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Attacks gain %1 Damage from the last Spell Cast. The Damage Type is the same as the last Spell Cast

name: Duty to Exterminate
description: Increases Maximum Rage and Willpower.

name: Reining In the Darkness
description: Your Spell Critical Chance Score is increased when your Willpower is above a certain threshold.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %1 Spells Critical Chance Score while willpower is above %2

name: Resilience to Corruption
description: When you are afflicted with damage over time, ailment damage affects your Force Shield before your Health.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Damage-Over-Time is dealt to your Force Shield before your Health

name: Faith Leech
description: Dealing Damage will now allow you to recharge Force Shield instead of restoring Health with Life Leech.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Life Leech affects Force Shield instead of Health

name: Branded Burst
description: After a few seconds of not being Hit, you gain a "Tenet" point. When you are Hit you ignore a percentage of the Damage and lose a "Tenet" point. The amount of Damage not dealt is increased with each point you have.

modifiers.HUDDesc: You gain 1 "Tenet" Point every %1s up to a Maximum of %2 "Tenet Points", and 1 "Tenet Point" is consumed whenever you are Hit.

name: Blessed Silver
description:
You have 5 "Annointed Ammunition" points that replenish every few seconds. "Annointed Ammunition" also replenishes  when you complete an Active Dodge.

For every "Annointed Ammunition" point you have, your Projectile Damage is increased.

For every "Annointed Ammunition" point you have missing, your Melee Damage is increased.

modifiers.HUDDesc: You have %2 "Annointed Ammunition" Point(s) that are used each time a Projectile Skill is used. A Point of "Annointed Ammunition" is refilled every %1s
%1 Projectile Damage for each Point of "Annointed Ammunition" you have
%1 Melee Damage for each empty "Annointed Ammunition" Point
%1 "Annointed Ammunition" Point(s) refilled whenever you complete an Active Dodge
%1 "Annointed Ammunition" Point(s) refilled whenever you deal a Critical Hit

name: Academic Fieldwork
description: Every time you kill a Champion enemy, you gain 1 "Headhunter" point up to a Maximum. Each "Headhunter" point increases your Material Damage for a few seconds. Your "Headhunter" points will be reset if you do not aquire a new point within a given timeframe.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Gain 1 "Headhunter" Points (Max %3) every  time an enemy that is Champion or above is killed, with Points resetting after %2s. "Headhunter" Points grant %1 Material Damage
Duration of "Headhunter" Points before resetting is increased to %2s

name: Hungry Stalactite
description: Damage is increased based on how much Pierce is remaining on a Projectile after it has Hit an Enemy.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Enemies are dealt %1 Damage per the amount of Pierce remaining on a Projectile after it Hits an Enemy
Enemies are dealt %1 Damage per the amount of Pierce remaining on a Projectile after it Hits an Enemy

name: Wintry Hail
description: When a Projectile Hits an Enemy, it will bounce off them and hit another enemy, dealing increased Frost Damage. Projectiles will not bounce if they have Pierce remaining.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Basic Attack Projectiles bounce up to %1 times to Nearby Enemies in %2m radius
%1 Frost Damage to Projectiles that have bounced.
Projectiles bounce to Nearby Enemies an additional %1 time(s)

name: Acute Tracking
description: Every second that you are in combat you receive "Cold Blooded" points that increase your Damage. If you are Hit the "Cold Blooded" points are removed.

modifiers.HUDDesc: While in Combat, gain "Cold Blooded" Points every %1s, up to a Maximum of %2

name: Static Transferral
description: Each time you use a Basic Attack, you receive an "Overload" point that increases your Damage. When you use a Skill, every "Overload" point is removed and the total Damage Buff provided by your "Overload" points is doubled.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %2 Damage per "Overload" Point. Basic Attacks generate 1 "Overload" Point up to a Maximum of %1. Using a Skill consumes all "Overload" Points but doubles Damage of the Skill
"Overload" Points are halved instead of set to 0 when consumed.

name: Intravenous Neural Cord
description: Whenever you inflict a Critical Hit on an Enemy, your Attack Speed Score is increased for a short duration.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %1 Attack Speed Score for %3s on Critical Hit
%1 Attack Speed Score for %3s on Critical Hit

name: Sparking Dart
description:
You have "Power Charge" points. This resource is now used to activate any Device Skills or Skills that deal the Lightning Damage Type. The resource can have any value between -100 and 100. When Power Charge is a positive number, your Damage will be increased, and when it is a negative number, your Damage will be decreased.

Power Charge is regenerated over time, and by using your Basic Attacks.

These Skills still consume their dedicated Resource in addition to "Power Charge".

modifiers.HUDDesc: Basic Attacks refill "Power Charge" Points by %1. %2 "Power Charge" Points are generated per second, capped between -%3 and +%3
Device Skills and Skills with base Lightning Damage have their Damage increased by %1 multiplied by your current number of "Power Charge" Points
%1 decrease in "Power Charge" Points Cost for all Device Skills

name: Tethered Shade
description: Whenever you Active Dodge, enemies in your path receive Damage and a Decoy is left at the starting position of the Active Dodge.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Actives Dodges Damage Enemies and leave a Decoy for %1s
Decoy left by an Active Dodge explodes when it is destroyed, dealing Damage in a %2m Radius
%1 Transfer Time decrease between Willpower and Rage

name: Life's First Movement
description:
You have 5 "Lure of Darkness" points and 5 "Lure of Light" points. When using a Spell you gain 1 "Lure of Darkness" point and lose 1 "Lure of Light" point. When using an Attack you gain 1 "Lure of Light" point and lose 1 "Lure of Darkness" point. When both points are weighted 6/4, they are considered to be in Equilibrium. While in this state, you will receive the following Buffs:

A percentage of your Attack Damage is added to your Spell Damage.

A percentage of your Spell Damage is added to your Attack Damage.

modifiers.HUDDesc: You have %1 Points shared between "Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" Points. Casting a Spell converts "Lure of Light" into "Lure of Darkness", and Attacking converts "Lure of Darkness" into "Lure of Light". When "Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" Points have a weighting between 6/4, they are considered to be in Equilibrium.
While "Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" are in "Equilibrium", your Attacks benefit from %1 of Spell Damage bonuses and your Spells %1 of Attack Damage bonuses
While "Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" are not in "Equilibrium", your Attacks lose %1 of Spell Damage bonuses and your Spells %1 of Attack Damage bonuses
"Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" Points are now considered to be in "Equilibrium" when they have a weighting between 7/3

name: Waltzing Smoke
description: Whenever you complete an Active Dodge, you become Invisible and your next Attack deals increased Shadow damage.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Completing an Active Dodge turns you Invisible for %1s. While Invisible, the Damage of your next Skill Cast is increased by %2. Using a Skill breaks Invisibility. This has a Cooldown of %3s.
Duration of the Invisibility triggered by an Active Dodge is increased by %1s
%1 Block Chance while a One-handed Weapon is equipped

name: Furious Appetite
description: Your Willpower generated is transferred into Rage.\n\nYour Willpower Regeneration is also applied to Rage instead.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Passively generate Rage instead of Willpower
Skills have %2 Rage Cost when Rage is over %1, but Skills cast at this increased Cost deal double Damage.
%1 Physical Damage converted into Fire Damage
%1 Physical Damage converted into Fire Damage
%1 Physical Damage converted into Fire Damage

name: Blistering Embrace
description: When you Hit an Enemy that has a certain number of Burn Stacks, your Hits have a Chance to consume the Burn Stacks that you inflicted and deal increased Damage per the number of Stacks consumed.

modifiers.HUDDesc: When Hitting an Enemy with an Attack, %1 Chance to consume the Burn Stacks you inflicted when their Burn Stacks exceed %2, increasing Damage of the Hit by %3 per consumed stack
Enemies killed by an attack that consumed Burn Stacks transfers %1 Burn Stacks to Enemies considered Nearby

name: Flurrying Flames
description: Each time you Hit an Enemy, you receive an "Unleashed Fury" point. Each "Unleashed Fury" point increases your Attack Speed Score, your Life Leech, and decreases your All Resistances Score.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Your Attacks generate "Unleashed Fury" Points up to a Maximum of %1. Points reset after %2s out of combat
%1 Attack Speed Score per "Unleashed Fury" Point
%1 All Resistances Score per "Unleashed Fury" Point
%1 Attack Speed Score per "Unleashed Fury" Point
%1 Block Chance while a Two-handed Weapon is equipped

name: Virtuose Stance
description:
You unlock the "Probing Weakness" and "Stalwart Resolve" Stances, each one giving you different Buffs. Using an Active Dodge changes your Stance.

While in the "Probing Weakness" Stance, your All Resistances Score is decreased, but your Basic Attacks have a chance to deal double Damage, including on Critical Hits.

While in the "Stalwart Resolve" Stance, your Attack and Spell Casting Speed Score is decreased, but your Block Chance is increased.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Gain access to two "Stances": "Probing Weakness" and "Stalwart Resolve". A "Stance" is changed when an Active Dodge is used.
While "Probing Weakness" is active, you have a %1 Chance to double Basic Attack Damage at the cost of %2 of your All Resistances Score
While "Stalwart Resolve" is active, you have %1 Block Chance and %2 Block Efficiency at the cost of %3 of your Attack and Spell Damage
Increases Chance to double Attack Damage while "Probing Weakness" is active by %1
Increases Block Chance while "Stalwart Resolve" is active by %1
%1 Added Block Chance and allow any weapon to block
%1 Block Chance while a Two-handed Weapon is equipped

name: Proud Reprisal
description: If you Block an Enemys attack, you instantly deal a percentage of your Weapon Damage in a counter-attack.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %1 of Weapon Damage dealt to Attacking Enemy when their Attack is Blocked
Damage dealt to Attacking Enemy when their Attack is Blocked is dealt as Rend Damage

name: Pugilist's Momentum
description:
Completing Basic Attacks with the same Weapon 4 times within a short period grants you different Buffs depending on the Weapon.

One-handed and dual-wielded Weapons always inflict Critical Hits on the 4th Basic Attack.

Two-handed axes, hammers, and swords always inflict Stun in an area of effect on the 4th Basic Attack.

Bows always launch Projectiles in 360 degrees around you on the 4th Basic Attack.

Staffs always launch multiple Projectiles on the 4th Basic Attack.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Provides alternative fourth Attack to each Basic Attack Combo
Fourth Attack of a Bow Basic Attack Combo shoots multiple Projectiles in all directions
Fourth Attack of a Staff Basic Attack Combo fires additional Projectiles in Target's direction
Fourth Attack of a Two-Handed Basic Attack Combo Stuns all Enemies that are Hit.
Fourth Attack of a One-Handed Basic Attack Combo is a Critical Hit
Fourth Attack of each Basic Attack Combo deals %1 additional Damage

name: Salvatory Anchor
description:
You will receive a Buff depending on which archetype your equipped Chest-piece belongs to.

If you have a Bruiser Chest-piece, you receive Health Regeneration for each Health point on the Armor.

If you have a Heavy Chest-piece, its All Resistances Score is doubled.

If you have a Rogue Chest-piece, you regenerate Health and Force Shield each time you complete a Passive Dodge. The amount that you regenerate is determined by the Health points given by the Armor.

If you have a Sorcerer Chest-piece you regenerate Force Shield based on the amount of Force Shield on the Armor.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Allows you to receive Buffs based on on the Chest-piece equipped
%1 Health Regeneration for every Health point on equipped Bruiser Chest-piece
Gain All Resistances Score equal to All Resistances Score on equipped Heavy Chest-piece
You regenerate Health and Force Shield equivalent to %1 times the Health given by your equipped Rogue Chest-piece each time you complete a successful Passive Dodge.
%1 Force Shield Regeneration for every Force Shield point on equipped Sorcerer Chest-piece
Allows Bonuses to be applied depending on Helmet equipped
%1 Health Regeneration for every Health point on equipped Bruiser Helmet
Gain All Resistance Score equal to %1 multiplied by the All Resistance score on equipped Heavy Helmet
You regenerate Health and Force Shield equivalent to %1 times the Health given by your equipped Rogue Helmet each time you complete a successful Passive Dodge.
%1 Force Shield Regeneration for every Force Shield point on equipped Sorcerer Helmet
Damage is increased by %1 multiplied by your equipped Shield's Block Chance
Damage is increased by %1 multiplied by your equipped Shield's Block Chance
Damage is increased by %1 multiplied by your equipped Shield's Block Chance

name: Belligerent Banner
description: Every few seconds you gain a "Fortress" point up to a Maximum. Each "Fortress" point increases your Block Chance. "Fortress" points are removed when a Block is completed.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %2 "Fortress" Point(s) gained every %1s, up to a Maximum of %3

name: Disallowing Vessel
description: While stationary you gain an "Inexorable" point every few seconds. Each point of "Inexorable" decreases your Movement Speed and increases your Damage. Moving will cause an "Inexorable" point to be removed after a few seconds.

modifiers.HUDDesc: While stationary, gain 1 "Inexorable" Point every %1s, up to a Maximum of %2

name: Dawn's Pious Striker
description: Enemies are killed instantly if Hit while their Health is below a certain threshold. This only works on Underling and Specialist enemies.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Dealing Sacred Damage instantly kills Enemies below %1 of their Max Health (Underlings and Specialists only)
Dealing Sacred Damage now instantly kills Champion Enemies below a percentage of their Health in addition to Underlings and Specialists

name: Unflagging Prayer
description: When your Health is below a certain threshold, you make a "Prayer", giving a Buff to the All Resistances Score of your Allies for a few seconds and reviving Downed Allies. This Effect has a large cooldown.

modifiers.HUDDesc: All Nearby Allies are Resurrected when your Health drops below %2 of Maximum
All Nearby Allies gain %1 boost to All Resistances Score when Allies are resurrected
%1 to All Resistances Score upon Ally resurrection

name: Beacon For the Lost
description:
When your Force Shield is above a certain percentage, your Spells that deal Sacred Damage deal increased Damage.

When your Force Shield is below a certain threshold, your Attacks that deal Sacred Damage deal increased Damage.

This ability only works if your Force Shield is above 0.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %1 Spell Damage when Force Shield is above %2 and %1 Attack Damage when Force Shield is below %2
%1 increase to Spell Damage when above Force Shield threshold and %1 increase to Attack Damage when below Force Shield threshold

name: Ancient Fervour
description:
Using Skills that deal Elemental Damage you their corresponding "Accord". Each Accord has different Effects depending on its Elemental Damage Type.

"Beelmalik's Accord" increases your Critical Chance Score for a few seconds.

"Abanazaar's Accord" increases your Damage for a few seconds.

"Etheliel's Accord" increases your Ailment Chance Score for a few seconds.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Spells that inflict Fire, Frost, or Lightning Ailments grant passive Bonuses called "Accords". Up to %1 "Accord(s)" can be active concurrently. Triggered "Accords" remain locked for %2s.
'"Abanazaar's Accord" is active for %3s unless it is triggered again. You have %1 Damage when "Abanazaar's Accord" is active
"Etheliel's Accord" is active for %3s unless it is triggered again. You have %1 Ailment Chance Score when "Etheliel's Accord" is active.
'"Beelmalik's Accord" is active for %3s unless it is triggered again. You have %1 Critical Chance Score when "Beelmalik's Accord" is active.
%1 Transfer Time decrease between Willpower and Rage

name: Elementary Destabilization
description: Whenever your Willpower is below a certain percentage, each time you use a Skill there is a Chance that you will cause an explosion. You and Enemies take a percentage of your maximum Health OR Force Shield (whichever is highest) as Damage, and a percentage of your Willpower is regenerated.\n\nThe Damage type of the Damage dealt is selected randomly between Lightning, Fire, and Frost.

modifiers.HUDDesc: When Willpower is below %2 of its Maximum, you have a chance to cause an Explosion, dealing Damage based on your Maximum Force Shield or Health. This Explosion regenerates %1 of your Willpower, and has a Cooldown of %4s.
Explosion caused by Willpower being below the percentage of its Maximum (stated in Elementary Destabilization) deals increased damage based on your Maximum Health or Force Shield.

name: Omnitempest
description:
Certain Skills that deal Elemental Damage Types have a chance to launch other Spells when Cast.

Lightning Skills can launch a Chain Lightning Spell.

Fire skills can launch a Meteor Spell.

Frost skills can launch a Frost Lance Spell.

modifiers.HUDDesc: %1 Chance to Cast a Meteor at cursor location when Fire Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s
%1 Chance to Cast a Frost Lance at cursor location when Frost Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s
%1 Chance to Cast Chain Lightning at cursor location when Lightning Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s
%1 Chance to Cast a Meteor at cursor location when Fire Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s
%1 Chance to Cast a Frost Lance at cursor location when Frost Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s
%1 Chance to Cast Chain Lightning at cursor location when Lightning Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s

name: Which Time Cannot Heal
description: When you Damage an Enemy that is afflicted with Stasis, they will take the Damage again after a few seconds.

modifiers.HUDDesc: When you hit Enemies afflicted with Stasis, they take %1 of the Hit Damage again after a %2s delay
Damage dealt after the delay is increased by %3

name: Captured Velocity
description: If you inflict Stasis on an enemy with an Attack, you gain a "Supernatural Paradox" point. Each point of "Supernatural Paradox" increases your Spell Casting Speed Score.\n\nIf you inflict Stasis on an enemy with a Spell, you gain an "Earthly Paradox" point. Each point of "Earthly Paradox" increases your Attack Speed Score.

modifiers.HUDDesc: You gain Supernatural Paradox Points when you Hit an enemy in Stasis with an Attack, and Earthly Paradox Points when you Hit them with a Spell. Points reset after %1s. Maximum of %2 Point(s)
%1 Spell Casting Speed Score per Supernatural Paradox Point
%1 Attack Speed Score per Earthly Paradox Point
%1 Spell Casting Speed Score per Supernatural Paradox Point
%1 Attack Speed Score per Earthly Paradox Point

name: Dire Juncture
description: A portion of the Damage you receive is delayed, and this delayed Damage does not interrupt Force Shield Regeneration.\n\nYour Maximum Health and Force Shield is decreased.

modifiers.HUDDesc: You only take %1 Damage from an Enemy's attack when they Hit you, the rest is dealt %2s after the Hit
Your Health is set to %1 of Maximum, and Force Shield to %2 of Maximum
Your Maximum Health and Force Shield are increased by %1 and %2 respectively from the Maximums set in Dire Juncture

name: Undertaker
description: Enemies that die near you have a chance to drop a Green Globe. If picked up, the Globe will increase your Toxic damage for a short duration. This Buff Stacks with each Globe picked up.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Enemies that die in %1m radius around you have %2 chance to drop green globes. Picking up green globes grants you an additional %3 Damage as Poison Damage for %4s
Summons that die in a %1m radius around you have %2 chance to drop green globes. Picking up green globes grants you an additional %3 Damage as Poison Damage for %4s
%1 to Attack and Spell Casting Speed for Summons
%1 to Attack and Spell Casting Speed for Summons
%1 to Attack and Spell Casting Speed for Summons

name: Toxic Emanations
description: Enemies receive a Stack of Poison every few seconds when they are close to you.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Every %1s, Enemies in a %2m radius gain a Poison Stack
Enemies are Slowed by %1 for %2s when they are within the radius

name: Sacrifice of Flesh
description: Your Maximum Health and Force Shield is decreased, but your Summons receive decreased Damage.

modifiers.HUDDesc: You lose %1 of your Health and %2 of your Force Shield, but all Summons take %3 less Damage
You lose an additional %1 of your Health and %2 of your Force Shield, but summons take %3 less Damage
You lose an additional %1 of your Health and %2 of your Force Shield, but summons take %3 less Damage
You lose an additional %1 of your Health and %2 of your Force Shield, but summons take %3 less Damage

name: Occult Affliction
description: The Occult damage that an Enemy receives from your Attacks is increased with each Curse stack they are afflicted with.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Occult Damage increased by %1 for every Curse Stack an Enemy has
Occult Damage increased by %1 for every Curse Stack an Enemy has

name: Fatal Pact
description:
Every Ailment that Stacks which you inflict is also inflicted on you. Each time you reach 10 Stacks of one Ailment Type, that Ailment Type is removed completely, giving you and your Allies a Buff for a short time depending on which Ailment type is removed.

If Stasis Stacks were removed, Movement Speed is increased.

If Curse Stacks were removed, All Resistances Score is increased.

If Weakness Stacks were removed, Damage is increased.

If any other stacks were removed, Health and Force Shield are regenerated.

modifiers.HUDDesc: You receive 1 Ailment Stack when inflicting an Ailment on an Enemy
When you have over %1 of the same Ailment Stack, you cleanse them, granting Buffs to yourself and Allies within a given Radius
%1 Movement Speed to yourself and allies in a %2m radius for %3s when Stasis Stacks are removed
%1 All Resistance Score to yourself and allies in a %2m radius for %3s when Curse Stacks are removed
%1 Damage increases for yourself and allies in a %2m radius for %3s when Weakness Stacks are removed.
Removing Ailment stacks that deal Damage-Over-Time restores %1 of Max Health and %1 of Max Force Shield to yourself and allies in a %2m radius
When inflicting an Ailment on yourself, %1 Chance to increase number of Ailment stacks inflicted by %2

name: Masochistic Effigy
description: Maximum Force Shield is doubled.\n\nYour Health cannot exceed 5% of your Maximum Force Shield.

modifiers.HUDDesc: Health cannot exceed %1 of Maximum Force Shield
Health cannot exceed %1 of Maximum Force Shield
